config.okzoomer.option.smoothCamera.tool: interfers with Cinematic Mode but it shouldn't be anything negative.
config.okzoomer.option.reduceSensitivity: Reduces the mouse sensitivity when zooming.
config.okzoomer.option.hideHands.tooltip: While enabled, zooming hides your hands.
Enables smooth transitions when zooming in and out.
config.okzoomer.option.zoomToggle.toolti: Enables the ability to toggle zooming.
config.okzoomer.option.zoomDivisor.toolt: The divisor applied to the FOV's zoom multiplier.
config.okzoomer.option.zoomScrolling.too: Allows to increase or decrease zoom by scrolling.
config.okzoomer.option.minimumZoomDiviso: The minimum value that you can scroll down.
config.okzoomer.option.maximumZoomDiviso: The maximum value that you can scroll up.
config.okzoomer.title: Ok Zoomer Config
